page.title: 10VINE LODGE PRODUCTS.
page.content: Vine Lodge Products is owned by Mr L.Hall.Vine Lodge makes and prints stickers in metallic gold,radiant red,crystal clear,ivory white and union jacks.The printing works was called Vine Lodge because this is Mr Hall's house name.He started Vine Lodge printing works 10 years ago when he was made redundant from Fogartys.He started in a shed in his back garden and is now in an old chapel.He moved there 3 months ago.With his first printing machine he had to set up the words letter by letter.He has now got a bigger machine which works like a big typewriter.The blocks that do the printing are made up of lead,tin and antimony.He sells his stickers in pop-up packs.The packs have a thousand stickers in them and cost Â£2.50 for white,Â£3.00 for gold and Â£4.00 for clear.
